name: Microsoft U81-00025 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Easy to Set Up and Use, No software to install, no feature setup required., Compact, Easy to carry along and use on small work spaces., Comfortable in Either Hand, Use your mouse with your left or right hand—ambidextrous design makes it comfortable either way., Scroll Wheel, Move through your documents quickly without having to click on the on-screen scroll bar., Optical Technology, High Performance Optical Technology—no mouse ball. 800 dpi optical sensor delivers greater accuracy and control., Device Stage, Quickly and easily access common tasks, including product information, registration, settings and more for popular devices such as cell phones, cameras, printers, and mouse, keyboard and webcam products., 3-Button Mouse, Get quick access to the media, programs, and files you use most often with customizable buttons.]
